column4: Hi again. i did all that steps, and restarted my laptop, but i cant access the remote computer via ssh
Are you able to connect to the internet wirelessly?
Yes.
but not to ssh.
Hrm. What are the results of the command " lsmod | grep bcm " ?
nothing
no output for lsmod |grep bcm
root@salaar-laptop:~# lspci |grep BCM
you gone?
Nope, just figuring stuff out yet. It's odd internet works with the ndiswrapper, but not ssh. Same symptom as before, right? Cannot ctrl+c out of ssh login?
Yes. Same as b4.
its becoming challanging problem.
is also trying to figure out the problem.
When following the guide at step 2, did you download the sp34152.exe file, or another one?
ftp://ftp.compaq.com/pub/softpaq/sp34001-34500/
i downloaded ftp://ftp.compaq.com/pub/softpaq/sp34001-34500/sp34152.exe
Ah, ok. Because your card is revision (rev01) and not (rev02), you need to download wget ftp://ftp.compaq.com/pub/softpaq/sp33001-33500/sp33008.exe instead.
shoult i start from step 2?? how to remove the older one??
and what will be steps again. and what change i will need to make.

Follow the guide once more  (I hope!) but replace the wget download link in the guide with the one I provided. You might encounter errors running the guide a second time, but ignore them, as you're only replacing existing settings with the same one.
The *only* change should be replacing the sp34125.exe download line with the one I linked :)
Ok.
